name: Women Lead the Way
title: High Female Ownership in Firms
description: In 2017, 70.4% of firms in Ecuador had female participation in ownership, showcasing a strong presence of women in business leadership.

name: Training for Tomorrow
title: Extensive Formal Training in Firms
description: Ecuadorian firms are committed to skill development, with 73.7% offering formal training programs to their employees in 2017.

name: Safety Net Shortfall
title: Limited Unemployment Benefits Coverage
description: In 2022, only 0.46% of the poorest quintile in Ecuador had access to unemployment benefits and active labor market programs, indicating a gap in social safety nets.

name: Child Labor Concerns
title: Prevalence of Child Employment
description: In 2015, 24% of children aged 7-14 were self-employed in Ecuador, with a higher rate among males (31%) compared to females (14%).
